content.title: Intro
content.content:
1989
Preceded by
1989
1990
Year
1991
Followed by
1991

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1990.

content.title: January
content.content:
? - Vinyar Tengwar 9 is published.
? - The collected issue of David T. Wenzel's graphic novel The Hobbit is published.

content.title: February
content.content:
19 - Actor Luke Pasqualino is born.
? - C.S. Lewis: A Biography is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
? - Vinyar Tengwar 12 is published.
10 - George Allen and Unwin is bought by HarperCollins.

content.title: August
content.content:
3-6 - Mythcon 21.
23 - The War of the Ring is published in the UK.

content.title: September
content.content:
21-24 - Oxonmoot 1990.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 13 is published.
? - A Tolkien Thesaurus is published.
? - Mallorn 27 is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
1 - Tolklang is founded by Julian C. Bradfield.
2 - Donald A. Wollheim dies.
14 - The War of the Ring is published in the US.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 14 is published.

? - The Lord of the Rings: Volume 1 is published by Interplay Productions.
? - The Tolkien Calendar 1991 is released.
? - The 1991 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar is released.
? - Beyond Bree 1991 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar is released.
? - American Tolkien Society Calendar 1991 is released.
? - Tolkien Phraseology: A Companion to A Tolkien Thesaurus is published.
? - Riders of Rohan, a video game, is released.
Years
1987 1988 1989 1990 1991 1992 1993
